Class MovementHandler

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.MovementHandler
public class MovementHandler extends Object
Handles movement calculations for brick positions. This class computes new positions but does NOT check collisions. Coordinate system: x = column, y = row

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
    private
    MovementHandler()
    We don't want to instantiate this utility class

  • Constructor Details

    • MovementHandler

      private MovementHandler()
      We don't want to instantiate this utility class

  • Method Details

    • moveLeft

      public static Point moveLeft(Point currentOffset)
      Computes the new position after moving left. Moves one column to the left (decreases x by 1).
      Parameters:
      currentOffset - the current brick offset position
      Returns:
      a new Point representing the position after moving left

    • moveRight

      public static Point moveRight(Point currentOffset)
      Computes the new position after moving right. Moves one column to the right (increases x by 1).
      Parameters:
      currentOffset - the current brick offset position
      Returns:
      a new Point representing the position after moving right

    • moveDown

      public static Point moveDown(Point currentOffset)
      Computes the new position after moving down. Moves one row down (increases y by 1).
      Parameters:
      currentOffset - the current brick offset position
      Returns:
      a new Point representing the position after moving down

    • translate

      public static Point translate(Point currentOffset, int dx, int dy)
      Computes a new position by translating the current offset by the given deltas. Creates a new Point object without modifying the original.
      Parameters:
      currentOffset - the current brick offset position
      dx - the change in x (column) direction
      dy - the change in y (row) direction
      Returns:
      a new Point representing the translated position
